author: Retro CreaTbJ

text: The stage theme of Plague Knight is my favorite stage theme in the entire game and my favorite contribution by Matsumae.  As for the Plague Knight DLC, i haven't played much of it, but I will say that it has been unusually satisfying to play.  I like that Yacht Club Games did it as free DLC and i feel that it much more challenging to adapt to.
author: Eric C.

text: One of my favorites from this OST. I still think An Underlying Problem is my favorite though. Plague Of Shadows is pretty great; I think I actually prefer playing as Plague Knight.

author: EvilMariobot

text: Oh man, this was some of the best DLC I've ever seen. They improved on everything the vanilla game had to offer, except for music. That one's as great as ever! Youtube user Major Third has a great couple videos analyzing in depth some of Jake Kaufman's work on SK, it's really worth a listen.
author: Maggy Reb

text: I actually get a vibe during the song that reminds me of Space Paradigms from the Tron world in Kingdom Hearts 2.
author: Cakeman777

text: This game's soundtrack in general is one of the best I've heard in years. Fits the NES-era feel and adds its own near flair.
author: SuperJTthunder

text: +SuperJTthunder It's funny you mention that, because this soundtrack actually IS capable of being rendered on a real NES.
author: Josh Walker

text: @Josh Walker Nope, since this uses the NES´s 5 soundchannels + 3 extra sound channels taken from Konami´s VRC6 chip.

author: Bainbridge

text: Plague knight was really fun to control. the possibilities are really fun to play with.
author: HyMyNameIsMatt

text: The Plague Knight expansion they released this year is DLC done right, especially when it's a Kickstarter stretch goal making it free. I have to admit, I couldn't help but feel disappointment during the first hour when I just couldn't get a feel for the controls, but after a while it clicked and I realized that this was actually very fun. Plague Knight plays so completely different from Shovel Knight that you see all stages in a different eye. Harder to control/master, but with a much higher and overpowered ceiling.
author: SupraDarky

text: +SupraDarky I had the same issue. That first hour i was not enjoying myself. But once the controls/mechanics clicked, it was GOLDEN!
author: KingDoopliss20

text: I started liking it the first I had to use my burst :3
